long_description: The Eagle Creek Pack-It(TM) Specter Folder 18 offers a lightweight way to keep clothing and accessories organized when traveling-it's extremely light, translucent and water resistant. Pack-It Specter Folder 18 easily and neatly folds your clothing into a compact space; 18 in. size is designed to fit 8 - 12 shirts and pants. Includes folding board with instructions on folding clothes for wrinkle-free travel; fits into most carry-on-size bags. Includes a quick-grab handle. Lightweight silicone-impregnated nylon fabric resists weather and stains; translucent fabric allows visibility and quick identification of items inside.
short_description: The Eagle Creek Pack-It(TM) Specter Folder 18 offers a lightweight way to keep clothing and accessories organized when traveling-it's extremely light, translucent and water resistant.
